data.message: Fixed context_assembler to load skills from index.json instead of globbing YAML files: Added load_skills_from_index() function, updated select_skills_for_task and assemble_context. Fix verified via direct Python test: 29 skills loaded (was 20), 8 TTS matches (was 0). MCP server restart needed.
data.task: Fixed context_assembler to load skills from index.json instead of globbing YAML files
data.outcome: Added load_skills_from_index() function, updated select_skills_for_task and assemble_context. Fix verified via direct Python test: 29 skills loaded (was 20), 8 TTS matches (was 0). MCP server restart needed.
